item.title: Trump could 'start taking sharp measures' if next government funding bills fail: Hassett
item.description: The Trump administration has warned that the shutdown will lead to federal employees getting laid off, rather than merely furloughed.

item.title: U.S. judge blocks Trump from sending any National Guard troops to Portland for now
item.description: A federal judge in Oregon on Sunday temporarily blocked the Trump administration from sending any National Guard troops to police Portland, Oregon.
